document.title: Hot Topic: The 1999/2000 MTAS Salary and Fringe Benefit Survey
document.abstract: The MTAS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 199912000 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees grew at a rate slower than 1998/1999. This report contains a summary of the findings as well as a means to request specific information.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#53
